settings.title: Escape Guide: Stowe, Vermont
settings.text: Whether you are closing out fall foliage in style, or planning ski weekends ahead, you can’t go wrong with a fall (soon to be winter…) road trip to Stowe.  Check out our packing list and Escape Guide for your next trip north.

settings.title: the latest from The flagship
settings.content: our guide to where to go, what to do, and how to enjoy #TheNextEscape

settings.title: MADE IN THE USA
settings.content: Premium components. Hand made quality and craftsmanship throughout.  Available for Made To Order in custom colors with embroidery and custom printed liner.

settings.title: FULL-GRAIN LEATHER
settings.content: Grab handle and bottom panel are hand cut from full-grain leather hides adding a level of sophistication to the functionality of the water resistant coated nylon.

settings.title: SPILL RESISTANT LINER
settings.content: 420D Coated nylon liner with debossed full-grain leather branding to keep your grooming essentials contained.

settings.title: External Shoe Compartment
settings.content: We found most shoe compartments don't leave much space for the rest of your gear.  Built with a spill proof liner, we designed this external shoe compartment to stow your trainers, loafers or golf spikes upright leaving plenty of room for your change of clothes and toiletry bag in the main compartment.  Also the perfect spot for wet bathing suits or gym clothes post workout.

settings.title: Padded Laptop Sleeve
settings.content: Get through security on the fly with this easy access padded laptop sleeve.  Throw your cell phone, keys in and send it through the scanner.

settings.title: Rolling Luggage Loop
settings.content: Exterior loop to rest your duffel on top of your rolling luggage.  Exterior slip allows for rolling luggage handle to extend through securing your duffel in place.  Luggage loop is built with an additional exterior zippered valuables pocket.

settings.title: CUSTOM BAGS
settings.content:
We make custom bags easy. Need a custom logo? No problem. Our collaborative process connects you with our design team to cut, sew and deliver premium American Made bags in 4-8 weeks. Check out our galleries below for inspiration and drop us a line to get started today.

Call: 1.855.256.6631
Email: Customs@hudsonsutler.com

settings.title: The Process
settings.content: A quick breakdown on the different ways you can customize our bags:  It's as easy as 1, 2, 3.
settings.content_1: Call 1.855.256.6631, email customs@hudsonsutler.com or fill out the form on this page. Send us your logo and we will walk you through next steps.
settings.content_2: It will take about 48 hours for our team of in-house designers to create some concepts for you to choose from.
settings.content_3: Once design, colors and logo are approved, production will take about 4 to 6 weeks to deliver your new favorite bags to your door.

settings.lgsub_heading: See what we can do on each gallery page by clicking the links below:

settings.title: Case Studies
settings.sub_heading: Looking for group orders for a certain event? Check out what we can do:

settings.testimonial_1: Translating our iconic blue bikes into a duffel was a lot of fun and created a unique extension of the brand.  Plus, they fit perfectly in our baskets and are nearly indestructible.
settings.testimonial_2: Everyone loves their Hudson Sutler bags.   They’ve become a staple of our offering and our Members use them everywhere they go.  In addition to making a great product, the Hudson Sutler team was super easy to work with.
settings.testimonial_3: Quality you have to feel to believe.

settings.title: EXTERIOR SHOE COMPARTMENT
settings.content: Coated nylon compartment to keep your shoes and gym gear separate from your belongings.

settings.title: PREMIUM COMPONENTS
settings.content: Full grain leather and nickel YKK zippers and clips for rugged durability.

settings.title: MADE IN THE USA
settings.content: Premium components. Hand made quality and craftsmanship throughout. Available for Made To Order in custom colors with embroidery and custom printed liner.

settings.title: Custom Weddings, Bridesmaids & Groomsmen Gifts
settings.content:
Tying the knot or know someone who is and need them fast? Stock bags with your custom embroidery, shipped in 3-7 days. Submit your email below for 15% OFF your order.

Call: 1.855.256.6631
Email: Customs@hudsonsutler.com

settings.content:
American Made daypacks and brief cases, built for your daily grind and to get you to your next out of office reply.  Premium gifts your customers will carry daily.  Send us your idea or check out some inspiration below.  We love custom projects and will work with you to bring it to life.

settings.testimonial_1: We ordered custom totes with our wedding logo and monograms for each of our wedding party.  The quality is top notch and the guys and girls love them.
settings.testimonial_2: We wanted a nice gift that our team would use for our annual sales meeting.  Our embroidered logo looks great and I still see them in use years later in the office and around town.

settings.title: Custom Toiletry Bags
settings.content:
The perfect gift for your client on the go. Our custom made toiletry bags are perfectly sized for daily essentials, power cords, facemasks, toothpaste to shave cream and everything in between. Pick your style, fabric, colors, and logos and let us take care of the rest. Drop us a line to get started today.

Call: 1.855.256.6631
Email: Customs@hudsonsutler.com

settings.content:
We take pride in the details. From custom branding to individual monograms, your choice of decoration is what makes it personal. We offer a variety of application to nail your details. Embroidery, screen printing, leather debossing, and  custom printed textiles complete the look of your made to order bags.

settings.title: Group ORDERS
settings.content:
Custom bags for your next event or trip. Need them fast? We’ve got you covered. Stock bags with your custom embroidery, shipped in 3-7 days, submit your email below for 15% off. Want it fully custom?  Choose your style, colors and logos. 50 piece minimum. Made in the USA in 4-6 weeks. 

Call: 1.855.256.6631
Email: Customs@hudsonsutler.com

settings.title: Special Offer

settings.title: The process
settings.content: A quick breakdown on the different ways you can customize our bags:  It's as easy as 1, 2, 3.
settings.content_1: Call 1.855.256.6631, email customs@hudsonsutler.com or fill out the form on this page. Send us your logo and we will walk you through next steps.
settings.content_2: It will take about 48 hours for our team of in-house designers to create some concepts for you to choose from.
settings.content_3: Once design, colors and logo are approved, production will take about 4 to 6 weeks to deliver your new favorite bags to your door.

settings.testimonial_1: The custom coolers we did for our golf weekend were amazing. The guys loved 'em, and use them all the time still. Thanks!
settings.testimonial_2: Unreal customer service. Thanks for getting us these shoe bags on such short notice.
settings.testimonial_3: We were so sick of cheap golf polos. The custom duffels were a total upgrade. Thanks guys.
